name: Random Kitten 1
description: In this drawing I was experimenting with basic body posture and grappling.

name: Random Kitten 2
description: In this drawing, I experimented with more realistic backgrounds and more complex postures such as sitting.

name: Random Kitten 3
description: In this drawing, I experimented with other postures and basic textures. As shown in the image, the grass is not well designed and shading/lighting was nonexistent. These would be developed in my later works.

name: Random Kitten 4
description: At this point, I had purchased a dedicated drawing tablet and started using that instead of a Galaxy Note 3. This was my first test using the drawing tablet.

name: Random Kitten 5
description: This was my first drawing that involves complex shadows and lighting. For several years I was not well versed with shading and lighting. With Krita and a decent amount of time experimenting, I was able to create this drawing.

name: Random Kitten 6
description: This is one of my most prized works of art as it shows my overall drawing development. Compared to my earlier works, this drawing involves improved shading, better textures, and more realistic postures.

name: Random Kitten 7
description: This is a special case drawing as it involves two cats instead of one cat.
